Emergency personnel also worked to clear blocked drains and open pipes, and to provide shelter to those who were trapped by the floodwaters.
Northamptonshire Fire and Rescue Service provided some assistance in dealing with the incident, but their role was limited by the time it took for fire crews to arrive on scene.
The Metropolitan Police Service said that no one has been arrested in connection with the incident and that the cause of the fire is under investigation.
